body: The art ks god tier brothers. We need this translated!
That blurr effect when she take off his glasses is amazing :)

There might be parts I missed because of the character limit (and I really want that line break in comment section). Could use more story of their encounter too. More about Yuu, his family is strict about him achieving and he got compared to his elder brother. They force him to study, go to more cram school, took away his phone. Well, he can’t feel any freedom at home, so he probably don’t want to go home as much as she is, even if for different reason. | 

The title is a wordplay. 盲目 means blind, but the author switched the first character with 望 which can mean looking at something far away, or hoping/desiring.

The parasite mentioned in the story is Eudiplozoon nipponicum. But the Diplozoidae has that habit. | Miura Yuu doesn't really pay attention to Takahashi Yuzuki, until when he saw her crying outside game centre and he can't get her out of his mind. Later, she came to him again, telling about how her mother is marrying again, and it feels like she doesn't care about her own daughter anymore. Yuu told her a story about parasite worm who would fuse with their partner and never separate again for the rest of their life. They even throw away their eyes after joining, such is love is blind. Instead, Yuzuki asks if she can forget everything like that, and they have sex. First, she wore his glasses, so both can't see well, like worms who discarded their eyes. Later he took it back, and it feels better when he can see her. He also don't like home, as his family is strict. In the ending, they went the to the same university.
Zamn this artist is top Tier
Yoo this is some quality shit. Hoping for English
Sheesh Tomboy in the wild is hot
